Literature.Title: Brevibacillin 2V, a Novel Antimicrobial Lipopeptide With an Exceptionally Low Hemolytic Activity.
Literature.Author: Zhao X, Wang X, Shukla R, Kumar R, Weingarth M, Breukink E, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15975(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis LMG 16216(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 6395(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=64µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(50-60% Cytotoxicity=7.38±0.30µg/ml)
